<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Field Medic](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=15)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 62 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

In the chaotic rush of battle, you learned to adapt to rapidly changing conditions as you administered to battle casualties. You patched up soldiers, guards, or other combatants, and learned a fair amount about the logistics of war.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) skill, and the [Warfare Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=760) skill feat.
